pr_title: KOGITO-2417 ui-packages for building the react app

timeline.bodyText: technically it shouldnt make difference but can you add it before the management-console module please.
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

timeline.bodyText: @jstastny-cz do we need these deps here?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,173 @@
+<?xml version="1.0"?>
+<project xsi:schemaLocation="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0 http://maven.apache.org/xsd/maven-4.0.0.xsd" xmlns="http://maven.apache.org/POM/4.0.0"
+    xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
+
+  <parent>
+    <groupId>org.kie.kogito</groupId>
+    <artifactId>kogito-apps</artifactId>
+    <version>8.0.0-SNAPSHOT</version>
+  </parent>
+  <modelVersion>4.0.0</modelVersion>
+  <packaging>pom</packaging>
+  
+  <artifactId>kogito-apps-ui-packages</artifactId>
+  <name>Kogito Apps :: UI Packages</name>
+
+  <properties>
+    <path.to.root>${project.basedir}</path.to.root> <!-- package.json in root dir-->
+    <path.to.packages>${path.to.root}/packages</path.to.packages>
+    <sonar.projectBaseDir>${path.to.packages}</sonar.projectBaseDir>
+    <sonar.sources>${path.to.packages}</sonar.sources>
+    <sonar.exclusions>**/__mocks__/**</sonar.exclusions>
+    <sonar.inclusions>*/src/**</sonar.inclusions>
+    <sonar.test.inclusions>**/*test.ts,**/*test.tsx</sonar.test.inclusions>
+    <sonar.javascript.lcov.reportPaths>
+      ${path.to.packages}/common/coverage/lcov.info,
+      ${path.to.packages}/management-console/coverage/lcov.info,
+      ${path.to.packages}/task-console/coverage/lcov.info
+    </sonar.javascript.lcov.reportPaths>
+  </properties>
+  
+  <dependencyManagement>

replies.bodyText: Nope, correct, bad copy&paste -> we don't use this as parent or use any deps directly. Will remove.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: On second look the version for eirslett might be set there ... otherwise I'd expect the build to fail - will investigate.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: Nope, it's managed in kogito-apps/pom.xml removing section.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

timeline.bodyText: this is the only file that is showing as new instead of a move, is that just the github UI?
timeline.author: cristianonicolai

replies.bodyText: It is some git magic, I've tried to revert and use git mv, but the result was the same. I don't understand why this happens especially when the file is 1-1 the same.
replies.author: jstastny-cz

replies.bodyText: Ah! It got reformatted heavily. I just moved it :-D . That's the crazy stuff to make our code pretty doing this!
replies.author: jstastny-cz
